subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Channeling 20 years of experience and excellence, the 43-year-old Bernard Hopkins dominated Kelly Pavlik, who was 17 years younger. It was Pavlik’s first defeat in 35 fights.
snippet: Channeling 20 years of experience and excellence, the 43-year-old Bernard Hopkins dominated Kelly Pavlik, who was 17 years younger. It was Pavlik’s first defeat in 35 fights.
